ComicInfo.Summary:
Hellboy gets rid of an alien that lends near their camping spot.
Hellboy still doesn't know what a sasquatch looks like.
Abe keeps putting Liz's fire out by accident.
Abe doesn't realize that he's been watching Roger's underwear.
Hellboy thinks he's caught a sasquatch but it's only Ualac the Demon.
The villains wear animal disguises to sneak up on Hellboy and his friends.
The gang wants to hunt sasquatches with Lobster Johnson but they don't do it the right way.
Lobster Johnson and his sidekick Lobster Smith meet Abe and the gang.
ComicInfo.Title: Quench!; Under What? Under Where?; It's Still a Creature; Try to Blend In; Let It Out!; You Call Him Smitty
